nodes.text: Ithorian Garden Loaf was a vegetarian dish served at Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu in 34 ABY. The dish consisted of a plant-based loaf served with Ithor-raised vegetables, and a mushroom sauce made with either snoruuks from Gamorr or mushrooms from nearby Yakorki. Explorer and author Eloc Throno recommended the dish in his Traveler's Guide to Batuu, describing it as lacking in meat but not lacking in flavor. The dish shared its name with the Ithorian species, and the Ithorian antiquities dealer Dok-Ondar was quite fond of it. Although it was suitable for human consumption, Resistance spy Vi Moradi preferred meat and asked Chadra-Fan Kriki to buy other foods to feed her team.

Ithorian Garden Loaf is one of the dishes sold to customers at the Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo food stall in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. The dish was first revealed as part of a large promotional event held on February 26, 2019. The official Disney Parks Blog describes the dish as "plant-based 'meatloaf' served with roasted vegetable potato mash, seasonal vegetables, and mushroom sauce." The vegan meat is an Impossible brand product made of potato proteins and soybeans, same as the Felucian Garden Spread's vegetarian meatballs.[source?]
